SELECT dai.id id, dai.`code` code, dam.publish_level publishLevel, dam.contributor, dam.description, da.id appId, da.`name` appName, dav.version appVersion, dav.id appVersionId, de.id envId, dai.status status, de.`code` envCode, de.`name` envName, ( SELECT count(1) FROM devops_env_pod dp WHERE dp.app_instance_id = dai.id ) podCount, ( SELECT count(1) FROM devops_env_pod dp WHERE dp.app_instance_id = dai.id AND dp.`status` = 'Running' AND dp.is_ready = TRUE ) podRunningCount, dai.object_version_number, cmd.`status` commandStatus, cmd.command_type commandType, cmd.error error FROM devops_app_instance dai JOIN devops_app_version dav ON dai.app_version_id = dav.id JOIN devops_env de ON dai.env_id = de.id JOIN devops_application da ON da.id = dav.app_id JOIN devops_env_command cmd ON cmd.object_id = dai.id JOIN ( SELECT max( decmd.id ) id FROM devops_env_command decmd where decmd.object = "instance" GROUP BY decmd.object,decmd.object_id ) mcmd ON mcmd.id = cmd.id LEFT JOIN devops_app_market dam ON dam.app_id = da.id WHERE de.project_id = #{projectId} AND dai.`status` != 'deleted'
ORDER BY dai.id DESC

SELECT dv. VALUE
FROM ( SELECT dai.id instance_id, de.id command_id, de.value_id value_id FROM devops_env_command de, devops_app_instance dai WHERE de.object_id = dai.id AND dai.app_id = #{appId} AND dai.env_id = #{envId} AND de.object = 'instance' ORDER BY de.creation_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) r, devops_env_command_value dv WHERE r.value_id = dv.id
